short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab masker that makes a new tab aesthetic and functional!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hebron sites changes the layout of every new tab. It maintains a dark background to maintain a low-key theme across the manager. Hebron sites features a "todo" list that can be added to (which also translates across new open tabs). In addition, it features a stopwatch at the top left for studying strategies. Download Hebron sites to add a unique twist on the function of every traditional new google tab.
